channel.title: Softlayer_resource_group on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_resource_group on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Resource_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Group Service Datatype Description SoftLayer’s resource group service allows users to access a broad overview of the resource group and its members Methods editObject getAncestorGroups Retrieve a resource group's associated group ancestors. getAttributes Retrieve a resource group's associated attributes. getHardwareMembers Retrieve a resource group's associated hardware members. getMembers Retrieve a resource group's associated members. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Resource_Group record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Resource_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Group Datatype Description Local createDate A resource group's creation date. Type: dateTime description A resource group's description. Type: string id A resource group's ID. Type: integer keyName A resource group's keyname. Type: string name A resource group's name. Type: string rootResourceGroupId Type: integer templateId A resource group's template ID.

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Group::editObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Resource_Group A skeleton SoftLayer_Resource_Group object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Resource_GroupInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
